text: Laura Miller was the mayor of Dallas, Texas. Laura Miller may also refer to: *Laura Miller (anthropologist) (born 1953), American anthropologist who specialises in linguistic anthropology and Japan studies *Laura Miller (Matlock), a character in the TV series Matlock *Laura Miller (journalist) (born 1980), broadcast journalist in Scotland *Laura Miller (writer), author, journalist and co-founder of Salon.com *Laura Miller (footballer) (born 2001), Luxembourger footballer *Laura Miller (mathematical biologist), American professor of mathematics *Laura Marie Miller, the birth name of the activist better known as Rosebud Abigail Denovo
title: Laura Miller (disambiguation)
